|stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCIe,USB 2.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.25 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 16-pin header,, J2 |specialfeat = |flags = enterprise class, PoE Switch, TPM |addchip = USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;;1;,,, Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3204T;;1;,,, 128K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C128;;1;,,, 4-Pin Phototransistor Photocoupler;Everlight;EL3H7;;4;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3232C;;1;,,, Low Voltage CMOS Quad 2-Input AND Gate;Fairchild;74LCX08;;1;,,, 6-Pin DIP Schmitt Trigger Output Optocoupler;Fairchild;H11L1M;;2;,,, Frequency Generator for PCIe USB QPI & SATA;IDT;9FG104CGLF;;1;,,, Micropower Supply Voltage Supervisor;Texas Instruments;TLC7701;;1;,,, 802.3at Int. PoE-PD Interface and PWM Controller;STMicro;PM8803;;1;,,, Quad Integrated 802.3af PSE Controller/PMIC;Broadcom;BCM59103;;,,, Low Drop Power Schottky Rectifier;STMicro;STPS15L30C;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;1;,,, 6A, 24V Input Int. Synchronous Buck Regulator;Fairchild;FAN2106;;3;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-816;;2;,,, 5A, 200V N-Channel Mesh Overlay MOSFET;STMicro;STD5N20;;1;,,, 15A, 30V Fast Switching N-Channel MOSFET;Ubiq Semi;QM3016S;;1;,,, 10.3A, 30V Fast Switching N-Channel MOSFET;Ubiq Semi;QM3004S;;1;,,, 13A, 100V Fast Switching P-Channel MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRFR5410;;1;,,, 1.5A Single Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2181D;;1;,,, 3A LDO Memory System Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS51116;;1;,,, 3.3V Octal Transparent D-Type Latch w/3-State Output;TI;SN74LVTH373;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.85.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = aerohive |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2017 |fccapprovdate = 02/15/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 700580841344 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B009G1W0SO |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9380; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The BR200 series also includes the BR200 (non-wireless) "2976399802" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos in the original filing.
"2976399805" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos in the CII PC made 11/02/2012. :The newer model features a barrel power connector and apparently a new USB IC.. and an Intel Flash chip is also visible. "2976399901" appears to be silkscreened on the wireless module. :The wireless module is also using three [[SiGe]] SE2595L front-ends. [http://www.peppm.org/Products/aerohive/price.pdf Price effective Aug 2012 at peppm.org is $559.20] for the AH-BR200WP-N-FCC submodel {{WiFiCert|WFA14605|02/29/2012}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' P1011 ''PowerPC'' (@667MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 64MB (Parallel NOR) Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 2x w/ 802.3af PoE *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9380 (3T3R 802.11abgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 host port *Expansion: 1x Mini PCIe (used by WiFi) *Power: 48V, 1.25A via barrel ==Links of Interest== [https://idency.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Aerohive_Datasheet_BR200-WP.pdf Datasheet] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/aerohive/aerohive_br200-wp |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
